title: Pearl Harbor episode 5: Chaos unleashed
itunes:title: Pearl Harbor episode 5: Chaos unleashed
itunes:subtitle: In the final episode in our new series on the raid on Pearl Harbor, Ellie Cawthorne speaks to Robert Lyman about the attack’s immediate aftermath and long term legacy, charting the chaos the Japanese offensive unleashed and tracing events through to th...
description:
In the final episode in our new series on the raid on Pearl Harbor, Ellie Cawthorne speaks to Robert Lyman about the attack’s immediate aftermath and long term legacy, charting the chaos the Japanese offensive unleashed and tracing events through to the present day.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
